data:
Exercise: choose the most plausible alternative.

I doubted the salesman's pitch.  so... 
- I turned his offer down.
- He persuaded me to buy the product.
Answer: He persuaded me to buy the product.

Exercise: choose the most plausible alternative.

The man confessed his love for the woman.  so... 
- The woman rejected him.
- The woman envied him.
